SSFairnessAudit 0.1.0
  • Reference

    Semi-supervised fairness estimation.

    SSFairness.Rd

    Semi-supervised fairness estimation.

    SSFairness(
  Y,
  S,
  A,
  threshold = 0.5,
  X = NULL,
  basis = "Poly(S)",
  nknots = 3,
  W = NULL
)

    Arguments

    Y

    Outcome, can contain missing values.

    S

    Model score.

    A

    Group indicator.

    threshold

    Threshold for classification based on the model score. Default value is 0.5.

    X

    Optional covariates matrix to be adjusted in the semi-supervised setting. Default is NULL.

    basis

    Different ways to construct W. Default is "ridge(S + X)". Other options are "Poly(S)", "Poly(S) + X", "Spline(S)", "Spline(S) + X", "glm(S)", "glm(S + X)", "ridge(S)", "ridge(S + X)"

    nknots

    Number of knots (only used when basis = "Spline(S)" or "Spline(S) + X"). Default is 3. Ignored otherwise.

    Value

    List of estimated fairness metrics and their variances.

    Contents

    Developed by Jianhui Gao.
